title: [GAME PLAY] No Ward Skin Selection

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I recently got a ward skin from Hextech Chest called **loot_skin_ward_skin_rental53 (nice variable name btw) and I decided to upgrade it. Afterward I tried to switch to skin but I don't see my ward skin select icon next to the spells anymore. Plz fix. Thanks =D

replies.body: We're aware of an issue where some ward skins don't appear or prevent the ward skin selection box from appearing. We're in the process of a fix! Thanks for your patience!
You cannot currently select wards.  It is a known bug listed under the current server status.
Whoops, didn't check there. Thanks for letting me know
